searchLabels.label: Search
searchLabels.result: Nothing found | {count} result has found | {count} results has found

categoryLabels.label: Category
categoryLabels.empty_details: Try to set {all_regions} in your location, or expand your search area on the map and save it again

deliveryLabels.label: Pickup points and self-pickup
deliveryLabels.pickup_points_enabled_placeholder: Search and select suitable pickup points on the map
deliveryLabels.pickup_points_loading_error_placeholder: An error occurred while loading pickup points
deliveryLabels.pickup_points_enabled_hint: The location is fixed in this mode, to change it, temporarily disable this option
deliveryLabels.shelf_life_hint: Please note that the shelf life must match the specified value
deliveryLabels.work_schedule_additional_info_placeholde: Add information about changes in the work schedule (optional)
deliveryLabels.pickup_point_creation_is_forbidden: The pickup points functionality is currently in public testing. If you want to open a pickup point, please contact support@bastyon.com first
deliveryLabels.hint_for_delivery_option_selection: Select an Pickup point or Self-pickup option (if available) on the map or in the list
deliveryLabels.hint_for_purchase_at_pickup_point: The "Buy" option will open a chat to complete the purchase

barterLabels.select: Select item that you want exchange
barterLabels.outdated: This offer publication date has expired
barterLabels.share_offer_on_bastyon_hint: Share your offer on Bastyon! You can also boost the post in the feed on Bastyon.
barterLabels.share_offer_option_availability: This option is also available on the offer page. More details about boosting a post here:

appBannerLabels.title: Stay in touch - don't miss a Deal!
appBannerLabels.paragraph1: To avoid missing messages in the messenger from interested users, use a mobile application with push notifications enabled.
appBannerLabels.paragraph2: You need to download the mobile application and log in. Links to download the application for major operating systems are located on the applications page.
appBannerLabels.details: If the Applications page does not open for some reason, please manually copy the link below and open it using your browser.

exchangeLabels.label: Exchange Options
exchangeLabels.title: We can find exchange options for you
exchangeLabels.text: Offer an exchange if you like the option found. Below are the best options.
exchangeLabels.empty: We can't find any exchange options right now :(

locationLabels.address_not_found: Sorry, that address could not be found

dialogLabels.label: Dialog
dialogLabels.data_node: Posting data to node, please wait..
dialogLabels.offer_renew: Are you sure you want renew this offer?
dialogLabels.offer_withdraw: Are you sure you want withdraw this offer?
dialogLabels.offer_delete: Are you sure you want remove this offer?
dialogLabels.video_delete: Are you sure you want to remove this video?
dialogLabels.need_remove_unpublished_video: The video has been uploaded but not published. It will be removed. Continue?
dialogLabels.pending_reg: Please wait until your account being activacted
dialogLabels.opening_room: The chat is opening. Please wait.
dialogLabels.submit_rating: Do you want to submit the rating?
dialogLabels.submit_comment: Do you want to submit the comment?
dialogLabels.map_help_info:
Offers displayed in the lists (category content, exchange offers, etc.) can be filtered by the visible area of the map.

Set it so that it covers the desired search area and click the "Save" button. To reset the selection, click the "All regions" button.
dialogLabels.saving_region_warning_by_zoom: The coverage of the visible map area is too small. Offer lists will be filtered by this area. Continue anyway?
dialogLabels.survey_error: An error occurred while sending your answers: {error}
dialogLabels.disabled_permissions: The following permissions are disabled: {error}. Click the "Application Settings" button to allow the access.
dialogLabels.app_geolocation_permission_error: You have restricted access to geolocation. Click the "Application Settings" button to allow the access.
dialogLabels.platform_geolocation_permission_error: Access to geolocation is restricted in the browser or operating system settings. You need to allow the access.
dialogLabels.error#4: You have already rated this offer earlier
dialogLabels.error#5: You can't add a rating to your own offer
dialogLabels.error#60: Your reputation does not yet allow you to rate offers low

photosLabels.upload_image_text: The first photo will be displayed in the offer, select the best one. You can upload up to {count} photos in {formats} format. To change the order of photos, use drag & drop. To make a photo the first, click on it.

videosLabels.upload_video_text: You can upload up to one video. Recommended video parameters: duration up to 2 minutes, resolution up to 720p. Uploading a video is optional. Uploaded videos can be found in the "My Videos" list on Bastyon.
videosLabels.video_processing_failed: Video processing failed. Please delete the video and try again.
videosLabels.wait_until_video_processed: Please wait until the video is processed or delete it
videosLabels.finish_working_with_video: Please finish working with the video

feedbackLabels.subject: Barteron, feedback
feedbackLabels.title: Leave your feedback here
feedbackLabels.name: Enter your name here
feedbackLabels.submit_success: Your request has been successfully submitted

surveyLabels.title: Anonymous survey
surveyLabels.prompt: You can help us improve Barteron! Take an anonymous survey
surveyLabels.question1: What can be improved in barteron first of all?
surveyLabels.question2: What do you like most about the barteron?
surveyLabels.email: You can specify an email for feedback
surveyLabels.empty_answers: You must answer at least one question

title: Title
my_list_text: Use this option when you need to specify the same exchange list for offers. The list can also be edited in your profile
currency_price_enabled_hint: The price in PKOIN will be updating automatically at the current rate of {currency} currency
currency_price_disabled_hint: The price in {currency} currency will be updating automatically at the current PKOIN rate
